name: "Astral Harmony" Saya Yamabuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 climax from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put a climax into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Well then, shall we forge on ahead to the Budokan with this song?

name: "Astral Harmony" Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Poppin'Party》 character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Reveal 1 ""Astral Harmony" Arisa Ichigaya" in your hand and put it into your stock & Put 1 "Days of MV Production" from your climax area into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Poppin'Party》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm glad PoPiPa exists.

name: "Astral Harmony" Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 ""Astral Harmony" Saya Yamabuki" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Extremely Satisfied" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent 2 times. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: The concert was SO MUCH FUN!

name: "Breakthrough!" Tae Hanazono
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: It's packed full of seats...

name: "Breakthrough!" Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: We need to concentrate.

name: "Astral Harmony" Kasumi Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Poppin'Party》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: All aboard the flavor train! Let's send 'em a slice of love right back!

name: "Breakthrough!" Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose 1 level X or lower 《Poppin'Party》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: It's just... Every day was a blast...

name: "Breakthrough!" Saya Yamabuki
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Lovey Dovey" from your climax area into your waiting room] During your climax phase, when this card is placed on the stage by the effect of "Lovey Dovey", you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: Well then, shall we head to the Budokan?

name: "Astral Harmony" Tae Hanazono
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Encore [(1) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: With the works! Whew, I'm stuffed...

name: "Breakthrough!" Kasumi Toyama
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Poppin'Party》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 ""Breakthrough!" Arisa Ichigaya" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the level of that card +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: We're so close to the audience!

name: "Mirai Train" Saya Yamabuki
text: 【CONT】 Your other level 3 or higher character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Poppin'Party》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Setting Sights on the Contest, Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card frontal attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: This contest is kinda turning into a big deal, huh?

name: New Song Decided, Tae Hanazono
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or becomes 【REVERSE】 during battle, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: It's here to stay.

name: "Straight Through Our Dreams!" Kasumi Toyama
text: 【ACT】 [Put 1 《Poppin'Party》 character from your hand into your clock & 【REST】 this card] Draw up to 2 cards.

name: Setting Sights on the Contest, Kasumi Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be returned to hand or put into memory." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if your stock has 5 or less cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: We enter, of course!

name: "Step×Step！" Rimi Ushigome
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Setting Sights on the Contest, Tae Hanazono
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card frontal attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: And we'll bring everyone with us. Oddie and Danjuro and my mom, too.

name: "Mirai Train" Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, your opponent declares 0 or 1 or 2 or 3. Reveal the top card of your deck, and if that card is a character of the level that your opponent declared, put it on any position of your stage. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Puzzled, Saya Yamabuki
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Poppin'Party》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.
flavorText: You guys...?

name: "Step×Step！" Kasumi Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Mood for Hot Springs, Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. ( Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: W-well, if you insist... I suppose I could go for a quick dip...

name: "Step×Step！" Tae Hanazono
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Poppin'Party》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and at the beginning of the encore step, your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Extremely Satisfied
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Lovey Dovey
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Days of MV Production
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: "Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Ako Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax with in its trigger icon revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Tonight, the almighty Roselia shall descend upon the Promised Land!

name: "Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is canceled, you may return this card to your hand.
flavorText: The version of us today is different from the people we were yesterday.

name: "Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Lisa Imai
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or deck, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 ""Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Lisa Imai", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "It's Getting Exciting" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of ""Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Lisa Imai" you have. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Let's go out there and show 'em what we're made of!

name: "Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Rinko Shirokane
text: 【CONT】 If you have another ""Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Ako Udagawa", all of your other 《Roselia》 characters get +500 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavorText: You're excited for the concert, aren't you?

name: "Einheit" Sayo Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Resonance [(1) Reveal 1 ""Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Sayo Hikawa" in your hand & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Roselia》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: One by one, we're going to conquer all of them.

name: "Einheit" Rinko Shirokane
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 ""Einheit" Rinko Shirokane" from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "Night of the Band's Training Camp" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 5 《Roselia》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Our audience wrote them for us...

name: "Einheit" Lisa Imai
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each other 《Roselia》 character in your back stage.
flavorText: Almost time for the concert, huh?

name: "Einheit" Ako Udagawa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Roselia》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, all of your characters get +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yeah! I'm itching to try it out!

name: "Einheit" Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 《Roselia》 characters from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock. 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when the damage you received is not canceled, if this card is in your center stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: As a band, we aimed for the stars.

name: "Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" Sayo Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Over The Future LIVE" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Roselia》 character, your opponent puts the top 20 cards of their deck into their waiting room.
flavorText: Every single stage Roselia stands on is meaningful in some way.

name: Band Interaction, Lisa Imai
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Roselia》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Roselia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: In that case, how about a pillow fight? Everyone can join in!

name: Setting Sights on the Contest, Rinko Shirokane
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may choose 1 "Striving Towards the Live, Ako Udagawa" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Roselia》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Roselia》 characters you have ×500.

name: Setting Sights on the Contest, Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Roselia》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yes. That's exactly right, Ako.

name: Live's Finale, Sayo Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Setting Sights on the Contest, Sayo Hikawa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I should be in perfect condition to perform at the concert.

name: "Straight Through Our Dreams!" Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put 1 《Roselia》 character from your hand into your waiting room] Put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Roselia》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the power of the character put into your waiting room by this effect.

name: "Avant-garde HISTORY" Rinko Shirokane
text: 【CONT】 All 《Roselia》 characters in your hand get "【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 2 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 3 times per turn. When you use a "Backup", you get an additional counter step after this step.

name: Striving Towards the Live, Ako Udagawa
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each other "Striving Towards the Live, Ako Udagawa" in your center stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory When "All Together in the Pool" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 2 or higher, and this card is in your memory, you may put this card on an open position of your stage.
flavorText: You came to our self-sponsored concert, right? It's the same venue!

name: "Avant-garde HISTORY" Yukina Minato
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return 2 《Roselia》 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Roselia》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card's soul does not decrease by side attacking."

name: Live's Finale, Lisa Imai
text: 【CONT】 All 《Roselia》 characters in your hand get "【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room]". 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Well, shall we?

name: "Over The Future LIVE" Ako Udagawa
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Over The Future LIVE
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: It's Getting Exciting
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Yukina: "This changes nothing. Roselia is destined to reach for the top."

name: All Together in the Pool
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Night of the Band's Training Camp
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
